document.full_text: former illinois governor rod blagojevich criticized prosecutors on wednesday for trying to bar his lawyers from telling jurors that wiretaps admitted as evidence against him represent only a fraction of secret recordings made on the eve of his 2008 arrest.
document.title: blagojevich says prosecutors thwarting his corruption defense
lines_and_colors: former illinois governor rod blagojevich criticized prosecutors on wednesday for trying to bar his lawyers from telling jurors that wiretaps admitted as evidence against him represent only a fraction of secret recordings made on the eve of his 2008 arrest.
